name: access_to_services
english: Access to basic services / food is perceived to be better elsewhere

name: unwelcome
english: The family doesn't feel welcome in current location

name: asked_resettle
english: The family was asked to resettle elsewhere

name: another_shelter
english: To another shelter within the current zone/settlement/camp

name: elsewhere_cox_bazar
english: To another zone/settlement/camp in Cox's Bazar District

name: elsewhere_bgd
english: To another town in Bangladesh outside of Cox's Bazar District

name: piped_tap_standpipe
english: Piped water into the settlement/public tap/standpipe

name: surface_water
english: Surface water (river, dam, lake, pond, stream canal, irrigation channels)

name: leave_in_sun
english: Leave bottled water in the sun/solar disinfection

name: overcrowded
english: There is not enough facilities/too crowded

name: lack_privacy
english: Lack of privacy/no separation between men and women

name: unsafe
english: It is not safe (no door, no lock, etc.)

name: difficult_access
english: Too difficult to access (steep slope, broken steps)

name: yes_didnt_see_coulldnt_observe
english: Yes (enumerator didn't see soap/ could not observe because interview was outside)

name: no_designated_facility
english: Do not have a designated bathing facility

name: no_response
english: I don't want to show the facility

name: bamboo_frame_mud
english: Bamboo frame with external mud walls

name: bamboo_frame_and_matting
english: Bamboo frame with bamboo matting walls

name: bamboo_frame_and_plastic_sheet
english: Bamboo frame with bamboo lattice walls covered in plastic sheeting

name: bambo_frame_with_lattice_mud
english: Bamboo frame with combination of bamboo lattice walls and mud walls

name: private_open_space
english: In an open space outside the shelter (private)

name: cash_for_rent
english: Provision of cash to pay rent

name: cash_for_materials
english: Provision of cash to buy shelter materials

name: shelter_const_train
english: Provision of training in shelter construction

name: shelter_const_support
english: Labour or support to help construct shelter

name: shelter_repair_support
english: Labour or support to help repair shelter

name: protection_suppt
english: Access to support/assistance on protection incidents

name: natural_disast_warning
english: Warning system for animal attacks or natural disaster

name: police_army_presence
english: Increased presence of police or army

name: free_movement
english: Government permission to move around freely

name: access_help
english: Assistance for elderly/disabled/vulnerable to access facilities

name: camp_doc
english: Documentation from camp (MOHA card, WFP card)

name: site_prob
english: Site problems: Lack of lighting, dangerous bridges/steps

name: sgbv_concerns
english: Concerns related to sexual and gender-based violence

name: lack_doc
english: Lack of camp documentation (MOHA cards, FCN, WFP Card)

name: no_understanding_bu
english: I don't understand Burmese at all

name: speak_only_bu
english: I speak Burmese but do not read or write Burmese

name: speak_read_bu
english: I speak and read Burmese, but can't write

name: speak_read_write_bu
english: I speak, read, and write Burmese

name: no_understanding_ba
english: I don't understand Bangla at all

name: speak_only_ba
english: I speak Bangla but do not read or write Bangla

name: speak_read_ba
english: I speak and read Bangla, but can't write

name: speak_read_write_ba
english: I speak, read, and write Bangla

name: no_understanding_en
english: I don't understand English at all

name: speak_only_en
english: I speak English but do not read or write English

name: speak_read_en
english: I speak and read English, but can't write

name: speak_read_write_en
english: I speak, read, and write English

name: yes_bgd_sim
english: Yes - with a Bangladesh SIM card

name: yes_mya_sim
english: Yes - with a Myanmar SIM card

name: family_journey
english: Paying for journey of family members left behind in Myanmar

name: safe_latrines
english: Access to safe and funcitonal latrines

name: medical_services_and_drugs
english: Access to health services and/or medicine

name: eat_worse_food
english: Rely on less preferred and less expensive food (i.e. cheaper, lower quality food)

name: borrow_food
english: Borrow food or relied on help from relative(s) or friend(s), or seeking additional humanitarian assistance (excluding WFP food vouchers)

name: reduce_number_meals
english: Reduce number of meals eaten in a day

name: limit_portion_size
english: Limit portion size at mealtime (different from above: i.e. less food per meal)

name: adults_eat_less
english: Reduce consumption by adults in order for small children to eat

name: accepted_poor_job
english: Accepted high risk, socially degrading, or exploitative temporary jobs

name: adults_beg
english: Sent adult family members to beg

name: children_beg
english: Send child household members to beg

name: use_un_ngo_facilities
english: Use the health facilities of UN agencies/NGOs/charitable organisations

name: travel_other_areas
english: Travel to other locations to seek medical attention

name: take_loan
english: Take out loan to cover medical expenses

name: seek_financial_support
english: Seek financial support from private donors/organisations

name: sell_assets
english: Sell assets to meet healthcare expenses
